text: Muhammadum Musthafayum is a 1978 Indian Malayalam film. The film has musical score by M. S. Viswanathan. ==Cast== ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by M. S. Viswanathan and the lyrics were written by P. T. Abdurahiman. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Lyrics !! Length (m:ss) |- | 1 || "Ahadavanaaya" || Vilayil Valsala || P. T. Abdurahiman || |} ==References== ==External links== Category:1978 films Category:Indian films Category:1970s Malayalam-language films Category:Malayalam films scored by M. S. Viswanathan
title: Muhammadum Musthafayum
